        PsiFile [] findFilesWithTodoItems()
        Returns the list of all files in the project which have to do items.
        Returns:
        the list of files with to do items.

      • findTodoItems

        TodoItem [] findTodoItems(PsiFile file)
        Searches the specified file for to do items.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to search for to do items.
        Returns:
        the array of found items.

      • findTodoItems

        TodoItem [] findTodoItems(PsiFile file,
                          int startOffset,
                          int endOffset)
        Searches the specified range of text in the specified file for to do items.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to search for to do items.
        startOffset - the start offset of the text range to search to do items in.
        endOffset - the end offset of the text range to search to do items in.
        Returns:
        the array of found items.

        Returns:

      • getTodoItemsCount

        int getTodoItemsCount(PsiFile file,
                      TodoPattern pattern)
        Returns the number of to do items matching the specified pattern in the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to return the to do count for.
        pattern - the pattern of to do items to find.
        Returns:
        the count of to do items in the file.
